text: Okanye (nibe) yiyo nantoni na edaliweyo (eqine ngakumbi) ezintliziyweni (ngokweengcinga) zenu,” Baza kuphinda bathi kwakhona: “Ngubani oza kuphinda asibuyisele (ebomini)?” Yithi: “NguYe Owanidalayo ekuqaleni!” Emva koko baza kuhlunguzela iintloko zabo kuwe bathi: “Iza kuba nini loo nto?” Yithi wena: “Mhlawumbi seyikufuphi!”
